mapper.select: select space_no, space_name, intro_main, space_tag, intro_detail from space where space_no=#{sn}
select H.h_nickname, H.introduce, S.mail, S.phone from space S inner join user_host H on S.id=H.id where S.space_no=#{sn}
mapper.insert: insert into space(SPACE_NO, SPACE_NAME, HEART, SPACE_TYPE, FACILITIES, INTRO_MAIN, INTRO_DETAIL, ADDRESS, SPACE_TAG, IMG_MAIN, MAIL, PHONE, SIGUNGU, ID) values(SPACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{space_name},#{heart},#{space_type},#{facilities},#{intro_main},#{intro_detail},#{address},#{space_tag},#{img_main},#{mail},#{phone},#{sigungu},#{id})

insert into SPACE_RESERVE_INFO(SPACE_NO, MIN_DAY, MAX_DAY, MIN_PERSON, MAX_PERSON, PRICE_STANDARD, PRICE_WEEKDAY, PRECAUTION, TIME_OR_DAY, OPER_TIME, REGULARLY_CLOSE) values(RESERVEINFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{min_day},#{max_day},#{min_person},#{max_person},#{price_standard},#{price_weekday},#{precaution},#{time_or_day},#{oper_time},#{regularly_close})
